mapper.insert: /** cmpApplyInfoInsert - 회사지원하기 - 회사_지원 테이블 등록 **/ INSERT INTO TB_CMP_APPLY_INFO( CMP_APPLY_NO , CMP_NO , CMP_APPLY_YN , CMP_APPLY_DOC_KIND_CODE , CMP_APPLY_1ST_KIND_CODE , CMP_APPLY_2ST_KIND_CODE , CMP_APPLY_DOC_INTERVIEW_INFO , CMP_APPLY_1ST_INTERVIEW_INFO , CMP_APPLY_2ST_INTERVIEW_INFO , CMP_APPLY_DOC_INTERVIEW_DTTM , CMP_APPLY_1st_INTERVIEW_DTTM , CMP_APPLY_2st_INTERVIEW_DTTM , CMP_APPLY_DOC_INTERVIEW_TIME , CMP_APPLY_1st_INTERVIEW_TIME , CMP_APPLY_2st_INTERVIEW_TIME , USER_ID , REG_DTTM , MOD_DTTM , USE_YN ) SELECT COUNT(cmp_no)+1 , #{cmpNo} , 'Y' , 'A02' , 'A01' , 'A01' , '서류지원 완료' , NULL , NULL , DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d') , NULL , NULL , DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%H:%i') , NULL , NULL , 'admin' , date_format(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d') , NULL , 'Y' FROM TB_CMP_APPLY_INFO
mapper.select: /** cmpApplyInfoListCnt- 회사 지원 정보 목록 카운트 **/ SELECT COUNT(*) AS cmpApplyInfoCnt FROM TB_CMP_APPLY_INFO A , TB_CMP_INFO B WHERE 1=1 AND A.cmp_no = B.cmp_no AND A.cmp_apply_yn = B.cmp_apply_yn AND A.use_yn = 'Y' AND B.use_yn = 'N' AND A.user_id = 'admin' -- 차후 로그인 기능추가 이후 변경 예정

/** cmpApplyInfoDetail - 회사지원 정보 상세 조회 **/ SELECT A.CMP_APPLY_NO AS cmpApplyNo , A.CMP_NO AS cmpNo , A.CMP_APPLY_YN AS cmpApplyYn , A.CMP_APPLY_DOC_KIND_CODE AS cmpApplyDocKindCode , A.CMP_APPLY_1ST_KIND_CODE AS cmpApply1stKindCode , A.CMP_APPLY_2ST_KIND_CODE AS cmpApply2stKindCode , A.CMP_APPLY_DOC_INTERVIEW_INFO AS cmpApplyDocInterviewInfo , A.CMP_APPLY_1ST_INTERVIEW_INFO AS cmpApply1stInterviewInfo , A.CMP_APPLY_2ST_INTERVIEW_INFO AS cmpApply2stInterviewInfo , A.CMP_APPLY_DOC_INTERVIEW_DTTM AS cmpApplyDocInterviewDttm , A.CMP_APPLY_1ST_INTERVIEW_DTTM AS cmpApply1stInterviewDttm , A.CMP_APPLY_2ST_INTERVIEW_DTTM AS cmpApply2stInterviewDttm , A.CMP_APPLY_DOC_INTERVIEW_TIME AS cmpApplyDocInterviewTime , A.CMP_APPLY_1ST_INTERVIEW_TIME AS cmpApply1stInterviewTime , A.CMP_APPLY_2ST_INTERVIEW_TIME AS cmpApply2stInterviewTime , A.CMP_APPLY_DOC_RESULT_DTTM AS cmpApplyDocResultDttm , A.CMP_APPLY_1ST_RESULT_DTTM AS cmpApply1stResultDttm , A.CMP_APPLY_2ST_RESULT_DTTM AS cmpApply2stResultDttm , A.CMP_INTERVIEW_PREPARE_INFO AS cmpInterviewPrepareInfo , A.CMP_INTERVIEW_REVIEW_INFO AS cmpInterviewReviewInfo , A.USER_ID AS userId , A.REG_DTTM AS regDttm , A.MOD_DTTM AS modDttm , A.USE_YN AS useYn , A.CMP_PROCESS_FINAL_COMPLETE_YN AS cmpProcessFinalCompleteYn , B.CMP_TITLE AS cmpTitle , B.CMP_LOCATION AS cmpLocation , B.CMP_FOUNDED_YEAR AS cmpFoundedYear , DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(), '%Y') - B.CMP_FOUNDED_YEAR AS foundedYear , FORMAT(B.CMP_EMP_CNT, 0) AS cmpEmpCnt , FORMAT(B.CMP_TOUCH, 0) AS cmpTouch , B.CMP_KIND AS cmpKind , B.CMP_DEADLINE_DTTM AS cmpDeadlineDttm , DATEDIFF(B.CMP_DEADLINE_DTTM, DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d')) AS deadlineDay , B.CMP_JOB_POSITION AS cmpJobPosition , B.CMP_JOB_RESPONSE AS cmpJobResponse , B.CMP_JOB_QUALIFICATION AS cmpJobQualification , B.CMP_JOB_PREFER AS cmpJobPrefer , B.CMP_WAREFARE AS cmpWareFare , B.CMP_COMMENT AS cmpComment , B.CMP_INCEDENCE_RATE AS cmpIncedenceRate , B.CMP_RESIGNATION_RATE AS cmpResignationRate , B.CMP_RECURIT_URL AS cmpRecuritUrl , B.CMP_HOMEPAGE_URL AS cmpHomepageUrl , B.CMP_PROGRAMMER_KIND AS cmpProgrammerKind , B.CMP_FAVORITES_YN AS cmpFavoritesYn , B.CMP_GOOD_YN AS cmpGoodYn , B.CMP_RECURIT_KIND AS cmpRecuritKind , B.CMP_RECURIT_PROCESS AS cmpRecuritProcess FROM TB_CMP_APPLY_INFO A , TB_CMP_INFO B WHERE 1=1 AND A.cmp_no = B.cmp_no AND A.cmp_apply_yn = B.cmp_apply_yn AND A.use_yn = 'Y' AND B.use_yn = 'N' AND A.user_id = 'admin' -- 차후 로그인 기능추가 이후 변경 예정 AND A.CMP_APPLY_NO = #{cmpApplyNo}
